top_comments.comment: A true labor of love! It's beautiful, Christina!! I don't think I could choose a fave wash; I think it depends on the piece and where it will "live" when it's finished. Def going to look into the Butcher Box thing. It might be just what I'm looking for!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Beautiful. Black looks great 👍
Love this classic ❤️
Gorgeous 😍
After watching your beautiful remake I’m going for this look on my kitchen cabinets!  QUESTION:  what would you suggest for a top coat?
Love this! I am leaning toward the black. ❤🤗
This is so beautiful!  I had no idea the flat would look so perfect!
I'm in love with the blackwash hands down it's gorgeous!!!!!😱❤️
I am obsessed with this! I need to try it now!
The black Wash is amazing. So modern. Even Industrial 😍🦋
I just did a black wash an all the drawer fronts of a dresser and nightstand.
Fabulous!!!! I like all the washes, depends on what I'm redoing
This came out SO good! I love that black wash and the hinges and hardware are perfect!! Would love to know what you ended up selling it for in comparison to your inspiration piece.
Absolutely beautiful!!! I will have to try this the next time I find a solid wood piece!
Black wash is gorgeous.
I’m obsessed with this and have it pinned somewhere. Can’t wait to find a piece to put in on. I love all the washes but this black seems classic and neutral for many decor
Absolutely beautiful❤

A true labor of love! It's beautiful, Christina!! I don't think I could choose a fave wash; I think it depends on the piece and where it will "live" when it's finished. Def going to look into the Butcher Box thing. It might be just what I'm looking for!
Love it SO SO MUCH ❣️ I definitely want to do this to my dinning room table & chairs ‼️
Love this!
